area: Cape Wrath to Rattray Head including Orkney (1)

forecast.wind: Northwest becoming variable, 2 to 4, then southwest 4 or 5 later, but increasing 6 later in far northwest.
forecast.sea: Moderate, occasionally rough later, to the west and north of Orkney, but elsewhere smooth or slight.
forecast.weather: Drizzle at times, fog patches in north, becoming fair later in south.
forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally poor in south and very poor in north.
